Text: THERE ARE NO COMMENTS BUT LOTS OF SEEDERS........................WHATS THIS????

the text is in Russian but the audio is in English. I checked the files and tried to find a language folder to try to delete the Russian language but it was the only one. It was a shame cause it was fast download and install.
